translations: n.火腿；蹩脚演员；无线通讯爱好者；（人的）大腿后部
【名】 （Ham）（英、瑞典、塞）哈姆，（老）罕，（柬）汉（人名）

sentences.sentence: I was eating ham and Swiss cheese on rye.
sentences.translation: 我当时正在吃夹火腿和瑞士乳酪的黑麦面包。

sentences.sentence: Every Saturday dad made a beautiful pea and ham soup.
sentences.translation: 每个星期六爸爸都做一道鲜美的豌豆火腿汤。

sentences.sentence: The villagers sentenced one man to five lashes for stealing a ham from his neighbour.
sentences.translation: 村民们判一个男人5下鞭刑，因为他偷了一个邻居的火腿。
